TITLE: Sign up to our newsletter for a weekly roundup of travel news
The world's fastest trains
SUMMARY: As the world faces up to climate change, short-haul flights look increasingly unattractive to many travelers. The flygskam (flight shame) phenomenon that started in Scandinavia is already inspiring many travelers to reduce their reliance on airlines.

TITLE: Donate now to a Top 10 CNN Hero
SUMMARY: Anderson Cooper explains how you can easily donate to any of the 2021 Top 10 CNN Heroes.
